title: What happened to chats being synchronised?
body:
Some time ago, Riot introduced a feature that caused everyone's chats to always read in the same order regardless of who joined first.
And it worked really well, for a time.

But the code or whatever seems to have completely degraded now and champ-select chats are just as jumbled as they used to be.
Everyone's chats being unique does nothing for team communication and causes SO MANY champ select problems. 

Can we get a renewal on the code or whatever it is, to re-establish the synchronised chats?

Legit ill be queuing with my friend, he will call jungle, ill call mid, and his call doesn't even register in my chat, so it looks like he hasn't called at all, _(and he's my duo on the same internet)_. 

We also get calls in different orders on each of our screens, and obviously the other players on the team are seeing things differently as well, judging from the shit that goes down in champ select, and it's not one off events either. 
It's just a mess. 

________

Also, on a side note...

Kayn is the biggest nuisance to champ-select we have had in a long time!
Usually the instalockers are mostly done and calmed down by the end of the second day, but they are out in full force still!
I have had 1 game today were there wasn't a Kayn support or a duo jungle, not to mention 2 or 3 dodges before you can even get into one of these games, and this has been going on steadily for the last 4-5 days. 

I guess he is another Yas/Zed themed-type champ who just appeals to that kind of player...
